sense.def: Abbreviated Designation zhu xin tong 疰心痛， heartache from [demon] attachment-illness. Pathological Condition of sudden xin tong 心痛 , heartache, acquired in the wilderness as a result of gui zhu 鬼疰 , demon attachment-illness. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 31: 療諸毒疰氣，心腹 脹滿，大小便不通，鬼疰心痛 , “It cures all types of poison and [demon] attachment-illness qi, distension and a feeling of fullness in the heart and abdomen, failure of defecation and urination to pass, as well as heartache because of demon attachment-illness ”.
